item.title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Traditional
Using the chords: A Am B C D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D or D DU DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: Memory from "Cats" - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: A, F-sharp minor, D, C-sharp minor, Bm, E, F#, B, F, Dm, Bb, Am, G, C, Em (Starts in the key of A, ends in the key of C).
Memory from the musical “Cats” by Andrew Lloyd Webber. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. I just added chords to the lyric video created by YouTuber Miyanoe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Michael Bublé - Someday
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Someday on the ukulele by Michael Bublé and Meghan Trainor. The chords used are G C D Am Em7 plus an optional Uke 2 part that uses A B Cm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Dire Straits - Sultans of Swing
item.description: Chords: Dm, C, F, B-flat, A Strum pattern - Included in the video Go to this video to practice the Riff with Quick Changes!!!: https://youtu.be/DfZEcfxpsW0

item.title: The Doobie Brothers - Listen to the Music
item.description: Chords: F, B-flat, Dm, G, C, E-flat Possible Strum Patterns: #1 = Two down strums on each big chord picture and one down strum on each little chord pictures. #2 = Four down strums on each big chord picture and two down strum on each little chord pictures. #3 = Syncopated strum within the video (listen closely for it...has a triplet feel)

item.title: Anthony Hamilton - Freedom
item.description: From the motion picture Django Unchained Performed by Anthony Hamilton & Elayna Boynton.

item.title: Los Panchos - Bésame Mucho
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Besame Mucho on the ukulele by Los Panchos. The chords used are Em Am E7 B A D C7 G G+ E6.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Niños Tres - Burrito Sabanero
item.description:
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos
This tutorial will show you how to play Mi Burrito Sabanero on the ukulele by Niños Tres. The chords used are G C D B A Em. Song is very syncopated so follow the bass line.
Strum - Easy DDDD, Moderate D DU D DU (emphasize the Up)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: The Time Warp - Ukulele Play Along - Rocky Horror Show
item.description:
Ukulele play along
The Time Warp - The Rocky Horror Picture Show Written by Richard O'Brien Original Roxy Cast - starring Tim Curry
Using the chords: A B B7 C D E7 F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
There are part of the song which would benefit from different strum patterns to make it more interesting eg. DU DU U U DUDU at the very start
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Hugh Jackman & The Greatest Showman Ensemble - From Now On
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for educational purposes ONLY.
All rights belong to Benj Pasek and Justin Paul.
Chords in this song: A, E, C#m, B
This is the song in it's original key. If you want an easier version to play, go check out this video we made! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wiqK8-BFhkg
Check out our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fredoniaukuleleclub
Like our page on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fredoniaukuleleclub/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel
Strum On!
